code: import{login,logout}from"../api/apiCalls";import*as ACTIONS from"../redux/Constants";export var logoutSuccess=function logoutSuccess(){var action={type:ACTIONS.LOGOUT_SUCCESS};return action;};export var loginSuccess=function loginSuccess(authState){var action={type:ACTIONS.LOGIN_SUCCESS,data:authState};return action;};export var updateSuccess=function updateSuccess(_ref){var displayName=_ref.displayName,image=_ref.image;var action={type:ACTIONS.UPDATE_SUCCESS,data:{displayName:displayName,image:image}};return action;};
